feature_section.title: Key Features of OneArcade
feature_section.image_alt: Two casino players enjoying a game of poker
feature_section.fallback_text: Experience the future of decentralized gaming
feature_section.comparison_subtitle: A New Era of Fair Gaming
feature_section.summary: OneArcade leverages One Chain Network Blockchain to provide a transparent, provably fair gaming experience with DeFi integration, allowing players to earn passive income through staking.
feature_section.feature1_description: All games use verifiable on-chain randomness through our Pyth Entropy, ensuring complete transparency and fairness in every outcome.
feature_section.feature2_description: Stake tokens across multiple chains to earn OCT tokens while playing your favorite games with minimal slippage.
feature_section.feature3_description: Enjoy flexible withdrawals, transparent bonus schemes, and full control over your assets through decentralized management.

how_it_works_section.title: How OneArcade Works
how_it_works_section.subtitle: Experience the future of decentralized gaming through our streamlined four-step process designed for both beginners and experienced players
how_it_works_section.step1_description: Link any wallet in seconds to unlock the full OneArcade experience. We support Keyless login Walets, MetaMask and all major Web3 wallets.
how_it_works_section.step2_description: Power your gameplay with OCT tokens of One Chain Network.
how_it_works_section.step3_description: Dive into /games tab of provably fair games including Roulette, Plinko, Mines and Spin Wheel. Every game provides real-time stats and detailed history.
how_it_works_section.step4_description: Win OCT tokens and unlock exclusive perks through our multi-tiered loyalty program. Earn cashback on losses and gain access to tournaments.

provably_fair_section.title: Pyth Entropy Powered Fairness
provably_fair_section.what_is_description: Pyth Entropy is a decentralized randomness service that provides cryptographically secure random numbers on-chain. It aggregates randomness from multiple sources and makes it available to smart contracts on One Chain Network.
provably_fair_section.why_matters_feature1: Cryptographically secure randomness from multiple sources
provably_fair_section.why_matters_feature3: High throughput suitable for gaming applications
provably_fair_section.why_matters_feature4: Immune to manipulation by players, casino, or validators
provably_fair_section.why_matters_feature5: Complete audit trail from request to result
provably_fair_section.step1_description: When you start a game, a randomness request is sent to Pyth Network Entropy on One Chain Network. The request includes a custom gas limit and required fee.
provably_fair_section.step2_description: Pyth Network provides cryptographically secure randomness derived from multiple data sources, ensuring provably fair results with on-chain verification.
provably_fair_section.step3_description: All randomness requests and results are recorded on One Chain Network blockchain, providing complete transparency and verifiability.
provably_fair_section.step4_description: Each game result includes request ID, sequence number, and transaction hash for complete transparency and verifiability.

testimonials_section.title: What Our Winners Say
testimonials_section.subtitle: Real stories from real players winning big on the most transparent blockchain casino platform
testimonials_section.success_stories_subtitle: Join thousands of players experiencing fair gaming with provably random outcomes and instant withdrawals.
testimonials_section.testimonial1_text: OneArcade offers the most transparent gaming experience I've found on One Chain Network. The provably fair system gives me confidence that games are legitimate, and I've already won over 500 OCT tokens!
testimonials_section.testimonial2_text: I love the token staking feature. Being able to earn passive income while also playing games creates a unique dual-earning opportunity that other platforms don't offer.
testimonials_section.testimonial3_text: The DeFi lending integration is brilliant. I was able to use my collateral to borrow OCT for games, and when I won big, I paid back the loan and kept the profits. Smart financial gaming!
testimonials_section.testimonial4_text: Weekly tournaments are extremely fun and well organized. The prize pools are generous, and the community is friendly and competitive in a good way.

roulette_page.european_roulette_description_1: European Roulette with a single zero and just no house edge - better odds than traditional casinos. Provably fair and powered by Aptos on-chain randomness module blockchain technology.
roulette_page.european_roulette_description_2: Bet on numbers, colors, or combinations for payouts up to 35:1. Every spin is secure and transparent on the blockchain.

strategy_guide.title: Strategy Guide
strategy_guide.description: Explore popular roulette strategies to enhance your gameplay. Understand the risks and rewards of each approach.
strategy_guide.important_text: Remember, no strategy guarantees a win. Always play responsibly and use these strategies as a tool to manage your game and bankroll.

martingale.title: Martingale Strategy
martingale.description: A high-risk strategy of doubling your bet after each loss, with the goal of recovering all previous losses and gaining a profit with a single win.
pros: Potential to recover losses quickly in the short term
cons: Extremely risky, can hit table limits quickly
martingale.example: Start with a $1 bet. If you lose, bet $2 on the next spin. If you lose again, bet $4, and so on, until you win.

dalembert.title: D'Alembert Strategy
dalembert.description: A safer alternative to Martingale, where you increase your bet by one unit after a loss and decrease it by one unit after a win.
cons: Can be ineffective during long losing streaks
dalembert.example: Start with a $5 bet. If you lose, bet $6 on the next spin. If you win, bet $5 again.

fibonacci.title: Fibonacci Strategy
fibonacci.description: This strategy uses the Fibonacci sequence (1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8...) to determine your bet size. After a loss, you move to the next number in the sequence; after a win, you move back two numbers.
cons: Can be difficult to keep track of
May take a while to recover losses
fibonacci.example: Start with a $1 bet. If you lose, bet 1, 2, 3, 5, and so on. If you win on a $5 bet, move back two steps and bet $2 on the next spin.

james_bond.title: James Bond Strategy
james_bond.description: A flat betting strategy that aims to increase your odds of winning by covering more than half of the table on every spin.
cons: Fixed loss if the outcome is an uncovered number
james_bond.example: On a total bet of $200: $140 on high numbers (19-36), $50 on six numbers (13-18), and $10 on 0 for insurance.

oscars_grind.title: Oscar's Grind Strategy
oscars_grind.description: A progressive betting strategy that aims to win a profit of one unit per cycle. After a win, the bet is increased by one unit until a profit of one unit is achieved.
cons: Can be ineffective in choppy games
oscars_grind.example: Start with a $1 bet. If you win, the cycle is over. If you lose, maintain a $1 bet. After your first win, increase your bet to $2 and continue until you have a profit of $1.

win_probabilities.title: Cosmic Win Probabilities
win_probabilities.description: Visual guide to win chances in European Roulette
win_probabilities.footer_note: Higher probability bets offer more frequent wins but lower payouts. Riskier bets have higher rewards but less chance of winning.

bet_types.red_black: Bet on red or black. Covers 18 numbers with 48.6% chance.
bet_types.odd_even: Bet on odd or even numbers. Covers 18 numbers with 48.6% chance.
bet_types.high_low: Bet on high (19-36) or low (1-18) numbers. Covers 18 numbers with 48.6% chance.
bet_types.dozens: Bet on first (1-12), second (13-24), or third (25-36) dozen. Covers 12 numbers with 32.4% chance.
bet_types.columns: Bet on one of the three vertical columns. Covers 12 numbers with 32.4% chance.
bet_types.six_line: Bet on two adjacent rows (6 numbers). Covers 6 numbers with 16.2% chance.
bet_types.corner: Bet on four numbers at the corner intersection. Covers 4 numbers with 10.8% chance.
bet_types.street: Bet on three numbers in a horizontal row. Covers 3 numbers with 8.1% chance.
bet_types.split: Bet on two adjacent numbers. Covers 2 numbers with 5.4% chance.
bet_types.straight_up: Bet on a single number. Covers 1 number with 2.7% chance.

roulette_payout.title: Cosmic Payouts
roulette_payout.description: European Roulette offers no house edge across all bets. See payout ratios below:
roulette_payout.footer_note: European Roulette (single zero) offers a no house edge compared to American Roulette's 5.26% edge (double zero).

red_black.name: Red/Black
red_black.description: All red or all black numbers

odd_even.name: Odd/Even
odd_even.description: All odd or all even numbers

roulette_history.not_enough_data: Not enough data to show hot numbers.
roulette_history.stats_note: Statistics are based on your last {{bets}} bets, with a current ROI of {{roi}}%.

mines_game.objective_text: The goal is to reveal as many gems as possible without hitting a mine. Each gem you find increases your payout multiplier.
mines_game.gems_info: Find these to increase your winnings.
mines_game.mines_info: Avoid these! Hitting a mine ends the game and you lose your bet.
mines_game.cashout_info: You can cash out at any time to collect your current winnings.
mines_game.strategy_text: The more mines you set, the higher the risk, but the greater the reward for each gem found. Decide your risk level and play smart!
mines_game.winnings_message: You won {{amount}} OCT with a {{multiplier}}x multiplier!
mines_game.one_safe_tile_message: Find the 1 safe tile to win a {{multiplier}}x multiplier!

header.title: Mines
header.description: A thrilling game of chance and strategy. Uncover hidden gems and avoid the mines to multiply your winnings. The more risk you take, the bigger the reward!

tutorial.title: Mines Gameplay Tutorial
tutorial.description1: Mines is a simple yet exciting game where you try to find gems while avoiding mines.
tutorial.description2: Set your bet amount and the number of mines on the field. More mines mean higher risk but bigger rewards.
tutorial.description3: Click on tiles to reveal what's underneath. Find a gem, and your multiplier increases. Find a mine, and the game is over. Cash out anytime to secure your winnings.

beginner.title: Beginner's Luck
beginner.description: Start with a low number of mines (e.g., 3-5) to get a feel for the game. This minimizes risk while you learn.
beginner.point1: Low Risk: Fewer mines mean a higher chance of finding gems.
beginner.point2: Consistent Small Wins: Aim for revealing a few tiles and cashing out for small, steady profits.

risk_management.title: Calculated Risk-Taker
risk_management.description: Increase the mines to a moderate level (e.g., 8-12) for a balance between risk and reward.
risk_management.point1: Higher Multipliers: More mines lead to faster multiplier growth.
risk_management.point2: Cashout Strategy: Decide on a target multiplier (e.g., 5x-10x) before you start, and cash out when you hit it.

bankroll_management.title: Bankroll Guardian
bankroll_management.description: Manage your funds wisely to play longer and increase your chances of winning big.
bankroll_management.point1: The 1% Rule: Never bet more than 1% of your total bankroll on a single game.
bankroll_management.point2: Set Limits: Establish daily or weekly loss limits to protect your funds.

advanced_pattern.title: Advanced Pattern Play
advanced_pattern.description: While Mines is a game of chance, some players use patterns to guide their choices. These are not guaranteed to work but can add a strategic layer to your gameplay.
advanced_pattern.edge_first_desc: Start by revealing tiles along the edges of the grid.
advanced_pattern.center_out_desc: Begin from the center and work your way outwards.
advanced_pattern.diagonal_desc: Choose tiles in a diagonal line across the grid.
advanced_pattern.note: Note: These patterns do not change the underlying probabilities but can help in making decisions.

high_risk.title: High-Risk, High-Reward
high_risk.description: For thrill-seekers aiming for massive multipliers. This strategy involves a high number of mines and requires nerves of steel.
high_risk.warning_text: This is a high-volatility strategy. Use with extreme caution and a small portion of your bankroll.

mines_form.auto_betting_mode_desc: The game will automatically place bets based on your settings. You can stop it at any time.
mines_form.manual_mode_desc: Set your bet amount and number of mines, then click 'Start Game' to begin.
mines_form.tiles_to_reveal_placeholder: Select number of tiles to reveal
mines_form.ai_assist_placeholder: Enable AI to assist with tile selection
